page.title: 01CUMBERNAULD - ABRONHILL
page.content: Cumbernauld is a{New Town}which lies on a hill 100-150m above sea level between Edinburgh and Glasgow and has excellent communications. The original design was such that all the residential areas could be served by the one nucleus which was a large indoor shopping complex. But as the town grew the outlying areas formed their own nucleus as the distance from the Town Centre had increased beyond a reasonable walking distance. The industrial areas of the New Town are separated from the residential areas to prevent pollution and unwanted noise.Abronhill and Wardpark Industrial Estate are in the north-east corner of Cumbernauld and will be discussed in greater detail in the following pages.
